data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Wien to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Wien, Austria
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Wien, Austria. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 8,944 believers in Wien, Austria a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Wien that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Kurd, Kurmanji people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Wien to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Wien, Austria so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Wien, Austria has a population of 1,569,300.

We estimate Wien has 8,944 people who might know Jesus, 1,053,882 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 506,474 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 175 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 8,944 believers in Wien against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

location.name: Wien
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Han Chinese, Mandarin, Czech, Dutch, Vietnamese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab (19,000), Han Chinese, Mandarin (38,000), Czech (18,000), Dutch (3,400), Vietnamese (3,600)
